Articles.Content:
figure id stop by and say hello.

just got the game after trying the demo so just looking around now

Hi Galileo Galilei, and welcome to the KSP community

Don't forget to drop by the add-on boards while you are looking around, there are some truly amazing mods for KSP.

Hi Galileo Galilei, and welcome to the KSP community

Don't forget to drop by the add-on boards while you are looking around, there are some truly amazing mods for KSP.

ive seen a bunch of the stuff and it looks amazing but before i get into mods i need to figure out how to fly straight.

Well Galileo, the ASAS helps a bit with that, but you still need to be careful when trying to maneuver as you have to turn it off for that.

For small rockets, the Avionics package seems to work quite well, it's not just for planes

Im looking for a tutorial on getting to the mun that is written ive read through some of the how to section but they are videos. If anyone knows of one it will greatly help. Have a ton of kerbals ever lost in space.

Hi Galileo Galilei, how about these?

Guide for Going to the Mun for all beginners and bottle rocketeers.

A Guide to Basic Kerbal Rocket Design Through Rocket Science.
